summary: This mod simply makes it so that the tanning rack and the smelter use your Smithing skill, and you get experience for it.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply makes it so that the tanning rack and the smelter use your Smithing skill, and you get experience for it.

Note that I wouldn\'t use this mod myself, since I feel that Smithing already levels probably too fast, but my friend wanted this mod and I saw another request for it, so I made it for her (and you, if you want it, of course).

Since this only changes exactly 2 objects, and only a single drop-down menu in each, I don\'t see why this would be incompatible with any other mods. (Honestly, this is so small I feel kind of silly uploading it, but I couldn\'t find anything that did the same already.)

(The picture came from UESP. </attribution> :) )

As always ratings/endorsements and sharing are appreciated.



Edit: D\'oh. Helps to upload a file, huh...? >>
author: AnkhAscendant
